name: Bloom（绽放）
description:
游戏玩法！！！！

请使用窗口模式开始游戏

开局等待三秒，在主界面点击回车

鼠标点击选取镜子，WASD上下调整镜子位置，QE调整镜子角度，空格转变镜子形态

This is a game about transmitting Light and Life. The planet is grey and dark. Light can barely goes in. All of the plants are dying...However, one light beam comes in. Please save the life of this planet! Game starts with press Enter button. Player's goals are 1 Collect enough flower petals shown at the bottom 2 Let the light go through the gap and reach the flower seed underground. Mirrors reflecting light in certain angle. Mirrors can also transform to torch and prism. They all control light in different way. Life goes with Light! 设计思想：光和生命的传递 在一个荒芜的星球上，光线难以传递，植物无法生存。但是，一束光意外的闯进了这个世界。玩家需要通过调整镜子的位置和角度，改变镜子的形态来传递光束。光束可以收集花瓣。这一束光最终将会被传递到 “那朵花”花种上面。伴随着光线的照射，“那朵花”将会从沉睡当中醒来，整个星球的植物也将复苏...
